content:
kind of a draft for now; not really complete yet
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86211

updated Option and Result method overviews pull request, probably ready
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86211#issuecomment-866327019
looks like josh just did a review, I'll hold off until you've resolved his comments to do a final pass review

My comments are very much at the micro-level. With the sole exception of the ones about one section of the transformations heading, none of them affect the overall organization. I think it'd be safe to go ahead and review in parallel.

I don't have any further comments beyond what I already posted. (I didn't go through and systematically make the same changes under Result that I did for Option; please apply the analogous edits in both cases, such as to section headings.)
thanks for the review!
@Josh Triplett when you get a chance, could you also please look at the updates to https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86211 to see if they address your feedback? thanks!
@Taylor Yu [they/she] I just read through it. One minor wording typo, and otherwise it's ready to merge. Thank you for this awesome work!
If you can push that commit I'll r+ it right now.
thanks! i responded with a note about how it's already fixed (at least i'm pretty sure it is) in a separate existing commit.
wow this PR is awesome :D
you opened it on my birthday, what a great birthday present haha

Taylor Yu [they/she] said:

thanks! i responded with a note about how it's already fixed (at least i'm pretty sure it is) in a separate existing commit.

Ah, so it is! Thank you, and sorry for the confusion. I was trying to review the specific commit that I thought had all your changes in response to my feedback, and forgot there were more commits after.
it's ok! these things are easy to miss sometimes.
Thanks for all the detailed work making the documentation wildly better.
@Taylor Yu [they/she] Do you have a Twitter handle? I'd love to mention this work there.
(if you don't object)
and that was a fascinatingly roundabout r=me @Joshua Nelson

Josh Triplett said:

Taylor Yu [they/she] Do you have a Twitter handle? I'd love to mention this work there.

sure, that would be great! i'm @argonblueon Twitter. i haven't updated it in forever though :upside_down:
triage does it pretty often; I'm not technically on the triage team but I like to pretend sometimes haha
@Taylor Yu [they/she] Scheduled a tweet for tomorrow, once the change has gone in and the nightly documentation has hopefully been regenerated.
Thanks again!
@Josh Triplett fyi bors may not get to it in the next ~4 hours before the next nightly release, so you may not want to make the tweet automatic
/me reschedules it for Thursday. :)
If I don't arrange these things when I think of them, they don't happen.
Scheduling helps.

Josh Triplett said:

If I don't arrange these things when I think of them, they don't happen.

I completely understand, I'm the same way with homework :laughing:
Lmk when that goes live so I can retweet
wow thank you all for the kind words!

Jane Lusby said:

Lmk when that goes live so I can retweet

US/Pacific 9:27am Thursday.
@Taylor Yu [they/she] This is the kind of work we rarely get someone enthusiastic about doing. You're getting some very real appreciation here. :)
It's on my calendar
@Jane Lusby ...that'd be a fun feature to have: "share my upcoming scheduled tweets with these specific users, and let them schedule retweets".
Yea
